sqlMap.sql: INSERT INTO pkg_packageattributevalue(id, attributeId, enabled, createTime, attributeValue, packageId, serviceId) values (:id, :attributeId, :enabled, :createTime, :attributeValue, :packageId, :serviceId)

UPDATE pkg_packageattributevalue SET attributeId = :attributeId <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> , enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> , createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> , attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> , packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> , serviceId = :serviceId </#if> WHERE id = :id

DELETE FROM pkg_packageattributevalue WHERE 1=1 <#if attributeId?exists && attributeId != ""> AND attributeId = :attributeId </#if> <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> AND attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> AND packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> AND serviceId = :serviceId </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if>

SELECT id, attributeId, enabled, createTime, attributeValue, packageId, serviceId FROM pkg_packageattributevalue WHERE 1=1 <#if attributeId?exists && attributeId != ""> AND attributeId = :attributeId </#if> <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> AND attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> AND packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> AND serviceId = :serviceId </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pkg_packageattributevalue WHERE 1=1 <#if attributeId?exists && attributeId != ""> AND attributeId = :attributeId </#if> <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> AND attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> AND packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> AND serviceId = :serviceId </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if>

SELECT id, attributeId, enabled, createTime, attributeValue, packageId, serviceId FROM pkg_packageattributevalue WHERE 1=1 <#if attributeId?exists && attributeId != ""> AND attributeId = :attributeId </#if> <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> AND attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> AND packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> AND serviceId = :serviceId </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM pkg_packageattributevalue WHERE 1=1 <#if attributeId?exists && attributeId != ""> AND attributeId = :attributeId </#if> <#if enabled?exists && enabled != ""> AND enabled = :enabled </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if attributeValue?exists && attributeValue != ""> AND attributeValue = :attributeValue </#if> <#if packageId?exists && packageId != ""> AND packageId = :packageId </#if> <#if serviceId?exists && serviceId != ""> AND serviceId = :serviceId </#if> <#if id?exists && id != ""> AND id = :id </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if>
